H0.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. Global Business Enterprise

H1.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. Large-Scale Employer

H2.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. Supply Chain Innovator

H3.text: wal-mart is a prime example of which type organization. multinational retail corporation

A4.text: Walmart Inc. is an American multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets (also called supercenters), discount department stores, and grocery stores in the United States and 23 other countries.

A5.text: Walmart is the world's largest company by revenue.
